title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.4 - Spillage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1155.4 - Spillage

State Regulations

In the event of spillage or dripping of gasoline, oil, grease
or any other material which may be unsightly or detrimental, the same shall be
removed immediately by the owner or operator of the equipment causing the same
or by the tenant or concessionaire responsible for the area. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1155.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
